titleStmt.title: God a Christian's choice, compleated by particular covenanting with God Together with an appendix, containing propositions, tending to clear up the lawfulness, and expediency of transacting with God in that way. In pursuit of a design proposed by Mr. R.A. in his book entituled, The vindication of Godliness. And by Mr. Tho. Vincent, in his book, called Words whereby we may be saved. To which is added, a brief discovery of the nearness of such a people unto God, on Psal. 148. 14. By Samuel VVinney, sometimes minister of the gospel at Glaston in Somersetshire.
titleStmt.author: Winney, Samuel.

titleStmt.title: God a Christian's choice, compleated by particular covenanting with God Together with an appendix, containing propositions, tending to clear up the lawfulness, and expediency of transacting with God in that way. In pursuit of a design proposed by Mr. R.A. in his book entituled, The vindication of Godliness. And by Mr. Tho. Vincent, in his book, called Words whereby we may be saved. To which is added, a brief discovery of the nearness of such a people unto God, on Psal. 148. 14. By Samuel VVinney, sometimes minister of the gospel at Glaston in Somersetshire.
titleStmt.author: Winney, Samuel.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Cockeril at the Atlas in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: "An appendix containing propositions" and "The nearness of God's covenant-people unto him" have separate dated title pages and separate pagination; register is continuous.
Reproduction of original in the Congregational Library.
